paragraphs: Products are driven by a variety of needs: user needs, market trends, technology stacks, stakeholder requirements, and the business context, to name a few.

My forte is gathering and synthesizing information. In a UX context, this means Iâ€™m integrating information about the factors that impact a product and ideating to come to mutually beneficial solutions.
I aim to keep the user at the center of the design process while bearing in mind how the business context shapes the solution.
